mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, NAME, OPER, OPERTIME, DAYSELLNUM, TRANSLATRATE, PUBLISHTIME, SELLPRICESTART, SELLPRICEEND, ROVERLAPENUM, OPENFLAG, CORPID, DAYSELLNUM2, TRANSLATRATE2, PUBLISHTIME2, ROVERLAPENUM2, DESCR, SQLFILTER, JSONSTR from db_competitorsearch where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, NAME, OPER, OPERTIME, DAYSELLNUM, TRANSLATRATE, PUBLISHTIME, SELLPRICESTART, SELLPRICEEND, ROVERLAPENUM, OPENFLAG, CORPID, DAYSELLNUM2, TRANSLATRATE2, PUBLISHTIME2, ROVERLAPENUM2, DESCR, SQLFILTER, JSONSTR from db_competitorsearch
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , NAME , OPER , OPERTIME , DAYSELLNUM , TRANSLATRATE , PUBLISHTIME , SELLPRICESTART , SELLPRICEEND , ROVERLAPENUM , OPENFLAG , CORPID , DAYSELLNUM2 , TRANSLATRATE2 , PUBLISHTIME2 , ROVERLAPENUM2 , DESCR , SQLFILTER , JSONSTR

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
DAYSELLNUM = #{daysellnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TRANSLATRATE = #{translatrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PUBLISHTIME = #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
SELLPRICESTART = #{sellpricestart,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLPRICEEND = #{sellpriceend,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ROVERLAPENUM = #{roverlapenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
DAYSELLNUM2 = #{daysellnum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TRANSLATRATE2 = #{translatrate2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PUBLISHTIME2 = #{publishtime2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ROVERLAPENUM2 = #{roverlapenum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
SQLFILTER = #{sqlfilter,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
JSONSTR = #{jsonstr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
DAYSELLNUM = #{daysellnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
TRANSLATRATE = #{translatrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
PUBLISHTIME = #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
SELLPRICESTART = #{sellpricestart,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SELLPRICEEND = #{sellpriceend,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
ROVERLAPENUM = #{roverlapenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
DAYSELLNUM2 = #{daysellnum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
TRANSLATRATE2 = #{translatrate2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
PUBLISHTIME2 = #{publishtime2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
ROVERLAPENUM2 = #{roverlapenum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
SQLFILTER = #{sqlfilter,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} ,
JSONSTR = #{jsonstr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
, 1=1
